thread.title: Is Deepika Padukone having too much in her bag
thread.title_full: Is Deepika Padukone having too much in her bag

title: Is Deepika Padukone having too much in her bag
text:
Is Deepika Padukone having too much in her bag? 
Entertainment (ANI) : Tuesday 20th October, 2015 
Change a channel or flip a page, one person that you will see everywhere these days is Deepika Padukone. Not only has the actress got a number of movies in her kitty to do, but she also has a number of ads lined up. 
The 29-year-old actress, who is seen promoting her upcoming flick 'Bajirao Mastani' these days, has got Imtiaz Ali's 'Tamasha' to do next and a flick from the Yash Raj stable with Hrithik Roshan, besides a remake of 'The Fault In Our Stars' with Varun Dhawan. 
Coming to endorsements, the 'Piku' star has got both of her hands dipped in honey, as she endorses everything from banking and financial items to real estate to lifestyle and fashion to FMCG, apparel and automobiles. 
Some of her endorsements include Coke, Axis Bank, HP, Van Heusen, Melange by Lifestyle, Kellogg's, Nescafe, Tanishq and ACE Real Estate. 
Today, Padukone commands the highest brand endorsement fee among her female counterparts. Her charges range between Rs.6 crore and Rs. 8 crore, say industry sources. 
Not only her films and ads has kept her in news, but Deepika's new foundation against depression 'Live Love Laugh' has also got her a lot of media attention. 
Deepika recently launched her foundation after battling depression herself. 
So, have you got her overdose yet? 
By Mehak Sabharwal (ANI)
